channel.title: Mirrors on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Mirrors on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: The Internet's Final Frontier
item.description: Today in Tedium: Thanks to the ever-shrinking nature of our electronics, the internet can go literally anywhere. I mean anywhere. It fits in your bag, appears on your television set, shows up on your desk, it makes a great window into your fridge, and even appears in your pocket. And since it fits in your pocket, that means you can take it inside the bathroom, making it a worthy replacement for a certain series of books we covered earlier this year.
